note.p: School teacher, missionary, and naturalist. Resident of Mahébourg, Mauritius. Corresponding member of the Zoological Society of London.
Julian P. Hume and Christine Taylor, ‘A gift from Mauritius: Wiliam Curtis, George Clark and the dodo’, Journal of the History of Collections 29 (2017): 467–79
Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London (1869).
